content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Nesibe. I am very interested in finding a suitable tenant. Now, let's discuss the rental price. What is your proposed price for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for the lowest possible price. Can you offer me a price?

The apartment is located in the city center and offers a nice view of the city. It is also equipped with all basic amenities, such as a heating system and a washing machine. The apartment is only 25 square meters in size, but it is ideal for a single person or a couple without children.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: I understand that you are looking for the lowest possible price, Nesibe. Given the size and amenities of the apartment, I am willing to offer you a rental price of €500 per month. However, if you are willing to pay a little more, I am open to negotiating on the price.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I accept the price of 500 Euros per month. I would like to sign a contract for one year.

Can you provide me with a copy of the rental agreement?

Thank you for your understanding.

Best regards,
Nesibe Trabelsi
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Of course, Nesibe. I am happy to provide you with a rental agreement for your review. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns. Once you have signed the agreement, I will arrange for a meeting to finalize the details and hand over the keys to the apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine
